data.name: Flower-Wreathed Feathers
data.passiveDescription: Decreases Gliding Stamina consumption by 15%. When using Aimed Shots, the DMG dealt by Charged Attacks increases by {{6//7.5//9//10.5//12%}} every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times and will be removed 10s after leaving Aiming Mode.
